text: latukhtabarunn -ayha almwmnwn- fi 'amwalikum bi'iikhraj alnfqat alwajbt walmsthbbat, wbaljwayh alty tsybha, wafi 'anfusikum bima yjb ealaykum min altaeat, wama yhll bikum mn jrah 'aw qutil wfaqd llahbab, wdhlk hataa ytmyaz almumin alsadiq min ghyrh. wltasmeunn min alyhwd walnsara walmushrikin ma yudhi asmaekm min alfaz alshirk walten fi dynkm. wa'iin tasbiruu -ayha almwmnwn- ealaa dhlk klh, watataquu allah blzwm taeth wajtnab mesyth, fa'iina dhlk min al'umur alty yuezm elyha, wynafs fyha
